remarks: If all the coefficients above ` M ` are zero, then the degree of ` F ` is at most ` M ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dgrub.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
dgrub.2 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
dgrlb $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ M e. NN0 /\ ( A " ( ZZ>= ` ( M + 1 ) ) ) = { 0 } ) -> N <_ M ) $.
